title: Bringing Up the Bodies
description: The book you've been waiting for...  With Kaitlin in critical condition after a fatal stab wound, reluctant psychic Billie Culpepper has learned that the body she found in the Murder House is actually her own father. With the help of Detective Mockler, the cold case of her mother's death is reopened as Billie searches for the truth behind her past and her family's connection to the infamous Murder House.  Adding trouble to the mix is everyone's favourite charlatan and occult investigator, John Gantry, whose own troubled history threatens to destroy them all.
author: Tim McGregor
